interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: YsesoAi 28 Pcs Hair Curlers Spiral Curls No Heat Wave Hair Curlers Styling Kit Spiral Hair Curlers Magic Hair Rollers with 2 Pieces Styling Hooks for Most Kinds of Hairstyles (20 cm/ 7.8 inches)
Review Date: 2020/10/12
Store: YsesoAi
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Brand': 'YsesoAi', 'Color': 'Pink, Blue, Ivory, Yellow, Green', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '745895771436'}
Review Text: My hair is just about too long for these, so I won't be getting much use out of them.  These do not look like it would be easy to achieve spiral curls with these rollers, because they roll straight on themselves like regular rollers, and do not come looking spiral like the advertisement picture suggests! I feel mislead! I'm sure I could try to get the outcome to look spiral but I do not have high hopes.  I would suggest a different product that arrives looking just like the picture in advertisement.
Review Title: For Short Hair Only!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Mtmei hair 5Packs 10" Pre-twisted Spring Twist Hair Crochet Braids 15 Strands/Pack Nubian Bomb Twist Crochet Hair Messy Fluffy Spring Twist Crochet Hair Extensions(T27)
Mtmei hair
{'Brand': 'Mtmei hair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '10 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '9.02 x 7.52 x 2.76 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '765470972508'}
There are pros and cons to this hair.  This hair is very soft and very stretchy, so it can be pulled back out of your face. I love that this came with a crochet hook.  The T27 color is pretty BUT it is very frizzy, especially on the blonde ends.  It came straight out of the package frizzy, so I was very disappointed.  It looks like hair that has been in someone's hair for 2-3 weeks before I received it.  it's possible to make the 5 packs work, but I would've preferred to have 6 packs of hair included to make sure there weren't too many gaps without any colored hair, especially since my natural hair color is dark brown.  Overall the hair is just OK.  Next time I'll go for hair that is a better quality.
It's OK
zelaxy Mask Strap Extenders, Soft Silicone Mask Holders for Relieve Ear Pain Caused by Mask (Dot)
zelaxy
{'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 4.7 x 0.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'zelaxy'}
These Mask Strap Extenders are so comfortable! They're soft and it's easy to forget you have them on.  I love how they help keep my masks that are too large in place and snug where they need to be.  I love that there's no pressure on my ears whatsoever! These are phenomenal.  I highly recommend!
Comfortable and Necessary
Ombre Burgundy Prelooped Bomb Twist Crochet Hair Prelooped Crochet Braids 18 Inch
UHair
{'Brand': 'UHair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Package Dimensions': '12.95 x 9.41 x 3.19 inches; 2.09 Pounds'}
I love this hair! It's GORGEOUS!!!  The color is perfect.  I love that these look neat and uniform.  The ends are curled to perfection.  There is definitely enough hair included to complete your full head without too many gaps.  The orange thing included looks more like a wrist band than a hair tie, but use it as you see fit.  This hair is phenomenal.  I highly recommend.
LOVE!!!!
Toyotress Sierra Passion Braid Crochet Hair - 24 inch 8 Packs Jumbo Box Braids with Curly End Synthetic Braiding Hair Extensions (24 Inch, 1B)
ToyoTress
{'Brand': 'ToyoTress', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '14.61 x 10.28 x 3.31 inches; 2.14 Pounds'}
I was hesitant to order these because I didn't think I'd like the design of the braids, but after receiving them they are beautiful.  They look really nice when completely installed.  These are neat, and frizz free.  I prefer to wash my hair before the install to remove any smell the hair may have picked up in transit.  I cannot say enough about this hair.  Buy it now! I highly recommend!
Beautiful!
YsesoAi 28 Pcs Hair Curlers Spiral Curls No Heat Wave Hair Curlers Styling Kit Spiral Hair Curlers Magic Hair Rollers with 2 Pieces Styling Hooks for Most Kinds of Hairstyles (20 cm/ 7.8 inches)

These do not look like it would be easy to achieve spiral curls with these rollers, because they roll straight on themselves like regular rollers, and do not come looking spiral like the advertisement picture suggests! profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to engage with hair extensions, particularly favoring vibrant, trendy styles like crochet and braids, and recently purchased longer styles to explore diverse looks. 

- **Quality Sensitivity:** There remains a strong preference for high-quality materials. Recent feedback indicates satisfaction with the neatness and frizz-free nature of their purchases, reinforcing a keen appreciation for well-made, visually appealing products.

- **Color and Design Considerations:** The user values shades that align with their natural hair and has shown positive reception toward diverse styles, suggesting a growing comfort and willingness to experiment aesthetically.

- **Packaging Expectations:** There is a consistent expectation for sufficient quantity in packs to ensure full coverage during installation, informed by past experiences.

- **Practicality with Tools and Accessories:** The user appreciates practical inclusions and ease of use, with a continued focus on comfort and convenience while remaining open to innovative accessories that enhance their experience.

- **Comfort and Functionality:** Emphasis on products that combine comfort with practical usability is evident, showcasing a balance between aesthetic appeal and functional needs.

- **Overall Attitude:** The user's positive outlook towards product experiences persists, but recent interactions with styling tools have highlighted occasional dissatisfaction regarding the alignment of product performance with advertising claims, especially for specific hair types. This indicates a discerning approach to ensuring satisfaction with their beauty choices.
